comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Mrs. J. Leslie Cotton, the former Mariette Benedict of New York was a painter, see article with photo in The Seattle star., September 02, 1910, Page 10. She was famous especially in England.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and link! We can add to the description when we next update it.
